steps.data: <?php add_action('init', function() { add_filter( 'Yoast\WP\SEO\should_index_indexables', '__return_false' ); $option_array = get_option('wpseo'); if ( $option_array && is_array( $option_array ) ) { $option_array['should_redirect_after_install_free'] = false; update_option( 'wpseo', $option_array ); } } ); ?>
